original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, as Manasseh his father had done.
korean_text: 아몬이 그의 아버지 므낫세의 행함 같이 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하되

sentences.original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 주님 보시기에 악한 일을 행했습니다.

sentences.original_text: as Manasseh his father had done.
